meanings.definition: Not able to be mixed with other substances.
meanings.sent1: The oil and water were unmixable in the container.
meanings.sent2: The paint colors were unmixable, so we had to choose a different palette.
meanings.sent3: The unmixable ingredients in the recipe caused a funny reaction.
meanings.sent4: Their personalities were unmixable, like oil and water.
meanings.sent5: The unmixable nature of the chemicals made the experiment challenging.

meanings.definition: Unable to be blended or combined.
meanings.sent1: The unmixable flavors in the smoothie created a strange taste.
meanings.sent2: The unmixable opinions of the group led to a heated discussion.
meanings.sent3: The unmixable socks in the laundry seemed to disappear.
meanings.sent4: Their unmixable styles clashed at the fashion show.
meanings.sent5: The unmixable textures of the fabrics made sewing difficult.
